SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_alarm_event (id, type, alarm_time, alarm_content, alarm_key, alarm_value, floor_number, room_number, prison_site, adapter_number, adapter_direction, ftp_name, camera_number, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prisonSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adapterNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adapterDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cameraNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_alarm_event set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alarm_content = #{alarmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_key = #{alarmKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_value = #{alarmValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor_number = #{floorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_number = #{roomNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prison_site = #{prisonSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adapter_number = #{adapterNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adapter_direction = #{adapterDirection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ftp_name = #{ftpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, camera_number = #{cameraNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, type, alarm_time, alarm_content, alarm_key, alarm_value, floor_number, room_number, prison_site, adapter_number, adapter_direction, ftp_name, camera_number, remark from t_alarm_event where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, type, alarm_time, alarm_content, alarm_key, alarm_value, floor_number, room_number, prison_site, adapter_number, adapter_direction, ftp_name, camera_number, remark from t_alarm_event
